search.query: index="prohelion_telemetry" source="prohelion_telemetry" data_pnt_name="Motor temperature" OR data_pnt_name="WS22 heatsink temperature" OR data_pnt_name="CMU PCB temperature" OR data_pnt_name="Max cell temperature" | rex field=data_pnt_name "(?<Device>.*) temperature" | rex field=msrmnt_name "Battery Management System (?<Device>.*) Status" | rex field=msrmnt_name "Battery Management System Min (?<Device>.*) Temp" | eval temp = if(fval > 100, (fval / 10), fval) | eval temp=round(temp,2) | eval warning='Warning Threshold' | eval alert='Alert Threshold' | eval shutdown='Shutdown Threshold'| eval warningspan = alert-warning | eval alertspan= shutdown-alert | eval shutdownspan = 100 - (warning + warningspan + alertspan) | chart max(temp) as Temp, max(shutdownspan) as Shutdown, max(alertspan) as Alert, max(warningspan) as Warning, max(warning) as Normal by Device

index="prohelion_telemetry" source="prohelion_telemetry" data_pnt_name="Motor temperature" OR data_pnt_name="WS22 heatsink temperature" OR data_pnt_name="CMU PCB temperature" OR data_pnt_name="Max cell temperature" | rex field=data_pnt_name "(?<Device>.*) temperature" | rex field=msrmnt_name "Battery Management System (?<Device>.*) Status" | rex field=msrmnt_name "Battery Management System Min (?<Device>.*) Temp" | eval temp = if(fval > 100, (fval / 10), fval) | eval temp=round(temp,2) | eval warning='Warning Threshold' | eval alert='Alert Threshold' | eval shutdown='Shutdown Threshold'| eval warningspan = alert-warning | eval alertspan= shutdown-alert | eval shutdownspan = 100 - (warning + warningspan + alertspan) | chart max(temp) as Temp, max(shutdownspan) as Shutdown, max(alertspan) as Alert, max(warningspan) as Warning, max(warning) as Normal by Device
